snippet: Georgia takes another step in its long quest to join NATO. A visit by Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel was symbolic as well.
abstract: Editorial praises Obama administration for taking measured steps to reassure Georgia, Ukraine and Moldova about Russia's expansionist streak; welcomes NATO designation of Georgia and four other countries as enhanced partners of the alliance; urges United States to move more quickly to fulfill Georgia's requests for orders from American defense contractors.
lead_paragraph: Georgia takes another step in its long quest to join NATO. A visit by Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel was symbolic as well.

headline.seo: Georgia Is Making a Case for NATO Membership
